text: Gordon Thomas Lawrence Lane (born March 31, 1953 in Brandon, Manitoba) is a retired Canadian ice hockey defenceman. == References == ==Other websites== * * *Gord Lane's biography at Manitoba Hockey Hall of Fame Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Brandon Wheat Kings players Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Hershey Bears players Category:Ice hockey people from Brandon, Manitoba Category:New Westminster Bruins players Category:New York Islanders players Category:Springfield Indians players Category:Stanley Cup champions Category:Washington Capitals players Category:International Hockey League (1945â€“2001) players
